is the one I'm testing.

hi Sara,

just wanted=
 to follow up with a bit more info. first off,
are you pointing to the righ=
t script, precisely "make_reports.pl",
rather than "make_report.pl" (withou=
t the "s" after report)?
secondly, are you having a specific problem with t=
he script?
if so, please describe it, and maybe we can help you figure
out =
the cause.

tack
